## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT1G04010](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT1G04010)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATPSAT1, ERP1, PSAT1</u>
- **Gene Name:** enhanced response to Phytophthora 1, phospholipid sterol acyl transferase 1
- **Description:**   phospholipid sterol acyl transferase 1;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
